comments.raw_text:
CTRL or CTRL-SHIFT clicking on history items are backwards from the rest of the UI.  CTRL-CLICK should open in the background and CTRL-SHIFT-CLICK in the foreground instead of the opposite.


STR:

0: New profile
1: Right click on Forward or Backward history arrow.
2: CTRL-CLICK on a item in the history.

Result: New tab is created and switched to immediately.
Desired Result: New tab is created in the background.


Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686; rv:7.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/7.0.1
Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686; rv:10.0a1) Gecko/20110930 Firefox/10.0a1
